name: Rogue Magnon - Ludum Dare 45
description:
So, this is Hank : 

Yes, he's kind of old fashioned, his clothes seems outdated. Not because he just spent his weekend in the last Burning Man event, but because he's a cave man.

Hello there!
Have you ever dreamed about being a cave man, fighting giant bloodthirsted moscitos?
If yes, this is your lucky day!
If no, well... you can still give it a try.

In Rogue Magnon, you start with nothing...

...then eventually you will find the finest crafted sword available 15 000 years old ago, or a deadly spear if you are more into distance combat (moscitos are pretty big, watch out!), or even a cool helmet that will hide your balded head.

At the end of each one of your combat, you will get stronger. However, everything as a cost, this is why you will loose all your equipment in exchange of your newly acquired experience. Then, you will start the next level with nothing again.

Controls:
  • Move: WASD/ZQSD/ArrowKeys
  • Orientation: Mouse
  • Mace: Left click
  • Bow attack: Right click
  • Show Experience: Tab key

Made with love, beers and pizza by the GDPOP team.
